title: Concurrent Manager Health / Eşzamanlı Yönetici Sağlığı
description: Displays all concurrent managers and their operational status

queries.sql: SELECT fcpt.concurrent_process_id, fcpt.process_status_code, fcp.queue_control_flag, fcp.max_processes, fcp.current_processes, fcpt.process_name, fcpt.os_process_id, fcpt.spid FROM fnd_concurrent_processes fcp JOIN fnd_concurrent_process_types fcpt ON fcp.process_type_id = fcpt.process_type_id WHERE fcpt.process_status_code IN ('A', 'I', 'E', 'S') ORDER BY fcpt.process_name

doc_hint: Displays all concurrent managers and their status. A=Active, I=Inactive, E=Error, S=Stopped. Check max_processes vs current_processes for capacity.
analysis_prompt: Analyze concurrent manager statuses. Report: (1) which managers are down/errored, (2) current load vs capacity, (3) any process_type_id mismatches, (4) offline managers that should be running.
